title: 23. MOYA WOKWETSIMA HLANTSWA MBILU YA MINA

lines: 1. Moya Wo Kwetsima, Hlantswa Mbilu Na Mobo Wanga;
Nghena, Tshama Ka Mina, Hosi Yanga Tana Sweswi.
Ndzi Tate, Ndzi Tate, Yesu Ndzi Tate Sweswi; Ndzi Tate Hiku Kwetsima, Aku Tshame Ka Mina.
2. Ndzi Nge Koti Ku Ku Rhuma, Ku Ndzi Tata Hi Moya;
Hi Mbilu Yanga Hinkwayo, Ndza Kombela Ndzi Tate.
Ndzi Khinsame Ka Wena Sweswi; Moya Lowo Kwetsima Ndzi Tate Rirhandzu Raku.
4. Wena Wa Ndzi Chavelela Loko Ndzi Ri Maxangwini;
U Basisa Mbilu Yanga Yi Kwetsima Na Sweswi
